description: Try our easy to follow Choc-Cherry Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: ChocCherry Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fold chocolate, mascarpone and cream together. Spoon into cases. Top with cherries and drizzle with a little of the syrup. Serve. Note: When melting chocolate make sure you keep stirring it over simmering water and don't let it burn.
